CustomField.description: Select the appropriate log level to capture for this process. - NONE, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, FINE, FINER, FINEST. The Log_Level_To_Capture__c field in the Business_Process__c custom object will take precendence over this value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Using this optional field, Administrators can select a log level to capture for the process to communicate what occurred during the execution. The options available are NONE, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, FINE, FINER, FINEST.
CustomField.label: Log Level To Capture
